description: This file defines Data Transfer Object (DTO) classes used for responses and query parameters related to analytics in the invoice backend system. It includes classes for summary KPI responses, timeseries data points, and timeseries response wrappers.

classes.name: AnalyticsDtos
classes.description: Container class for various analytics response DTOs.

classes.name: SummaryResponse
classes.description: DTO for KPI summary response on the dashboard, including total outstanding amount, average payment delay, on-time payment rate, and invoice status counts.

classes.name: TimeseriesPoint
classes.description: Represents a data point in a timeseries chart, with a date period, amount, partner ID, and status.

classes.name: TimeseriesResponse
classes.description: Wraps a timeseries dataset including metric name and list of points.
